subject: thank you notes 8/14
body: i'm thankful that i was distracted by something else today and forgot to write my notes until now. i'm thankful that instead of writing more notes, i am going to go do some yoga before getting into bed and reading a book. i'm thankful, though, that it felt important to me to write a note to you, even though i don't really feel like writing a note. i'm thankful to hope that you had a really wonderful sunday. i'm thankful that i did, even if it was an unexpected kind of wonderful, the kind that throws off my routines. i'm thankful for the homemade chocolate chip cookies d made.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that i was distracted by something else today and forgot to write my notes until now. i'm thankful that instead of writing more notes, i am going to go do some yoga before getting into bed and reading a book. i'm thankful, though, that it felt important to me to write a note to you, even though i don't really feel like writing a note. i'm thankful to hope that you had a really wonderful sunday. i'm thankful that i did, even if it was an unexpected kind of wonderful, the kind that throws off my routines. i'm thankful for the homemade chocolate chip cookies d made.
